register.title: Sign up
register.old_account: Already have an account? Log in!

error_message.main: The form has been filled in incorrectly or is empty!
error_message.username: Username is required and must be between 6 and 16 characters.
error_message.first_name: First name is required and cannot exceed 32 characters.
error_message.surname: Surname is required and cannot exceed 32 characters.
error_message.password: Password is required. It must contain at least: one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one digit, and one special character. It cannot contain whitespace and must be at least 8 characters long.

success_message.success: The account has been successfully registered
